amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute recoommended by the Committee on Ways and Means and considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 302.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute by the Committee on Ways and Means considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 302.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ways and Means amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
